name: gathering-event-assertion
title: GatheringEventAssertion
description: An observation, measurement, or other statement made by an Agent with respect to a GatheringEvent.

fields.name: assertionID
fields.description: The unique identifier for an Assertion.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: parentAssertionID
fields.description: The identifier for the Assertion that this Assertion is about.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: gatheringEventID
fields.description: The identifier for the GatheringEvent that this Assertion is about.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: assertionMadeDate
fields.description: The date-time or interval during which an Assertion was made.
fields.comments: This is the date-time when the Assertion was made and may differ from the assertionEffectiveDate.
fields.examples: `1963-03-08T14:07-0600` (8 Mar 1963 at 2:07pm in the time zone six hours earlier than UTC); `2009-02-20T08:40Z` (20 February 2009 8:40am UTC); `2018-08-29T15:19` (3:19pm local time on 29 August 2018); `1809-02-12` (some time during 12 February 1809); `1906-06` (some time in June 1906); `1971` (some time in the year 1971); `2007-03-01T13:00:00Z/2008-05-11T15:30:00Z` (some time during the interval between 1 March 2007 1pm UTC and 11 May 2008 3:30pm UTC); `1900/1909` (some time during the interval between the beginning of the year 1900 and the end of the year 1909); `2007-11-13/15` (some time in the interval between 13 November 2007 and 15 November 2007)

fields.name: assertionEffectiveDate
fields.description: The date-time or interval during which an Assertion applies.
fields.comments: This is the date-time when the Assertion applies and may differ from the assertionMadeDate.
fields.examples: `1963-03-08T14:07-0600` (8 Mar 1963 at 2:07pm in the time zone six hours earlier than UTC); `2009-02-20T08:40Z` (20 February 2009 8:40am UTC); `2018-08-29T15:19` (3:19pm local time on 29 August 2018); `1809-02-12` (some time during 12 February 1809); `1906-06` (some time in June 1906); `1971` (some time in the year 1971); `2007-03-01T13:00:00Z/2008-05-11T15:30:00Z` (some time during the interval between 1 March 2007 1pm UTC and 11 May 2008 3:30pm UTC); `1900/1909` (some time during the interval between the beginning of the year 1900 and the end of the year 1909); `2007-11-13/15` (some time in the interval between 13 November 2007 and 15 November 2007)

fields.name: assertionValue
fields.description: The value posited by the Assertion in the case that it is not numeric.
fields.comments: Numeric Assertion values go in assertionValueNumeric. Units, if any, go in assertionUnit. Consider using values from a controlled vocabulary associated with the assertionType, if appropriate.

fields.name: assertionValueNumeric
fields.description: The value posited by the Assertion in the case that it is numeric.
fields.comments: Non-numeric Assertion values go in assertionValue. Units, if any, go in assertionUnit.

fields.name: assertionUnit
fields.description: The unit of measurement for the assertionValue or assertionValueNumeric.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary of units associated with the assertionType.

fields.name: assertionByAgentName
fields.description: The preferred form of the name when referring to the Agent.

fields.name: assertionByAgentID
fields.description: The identifier for the Agent that made this Assertion.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: assertionProtocol
fields.description: A detailed description of the method(s) used to make the Assertion.

fields.name: assertionRemarks
fields.description: Notes or comments about the Assertion.
